value.desc: Model of the component defining current panel's name; If used as Number, it does not defines panel index though but slide name's which may be an Integer; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

keep-alive.desc: Equivalent to using Vue's native <keep-alive> component on the content

animated.desc: Enable transitions between panel (also see 'transition-prev' and 'transition-next' props)

infinite.desc: Makes component appear as infinite (when reaching last panel, next one will become the first one)

swipeable.desc: Enable swipe events (may interfere with content's touch/mouse events)

transition-prev.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

transition-next.desc: One of Quasar's embedded transitions (has effect only if 'animated' prop is set)

height.desc: Height of Carousel in CSS units, including unit name

padding.desc: Applies a default padding to each slide, according to the usage of 'arrows' and 'navigation' props

control-color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

autoplay.desc: Jump to next slide at fixed time intervals (in milliseconds); 'false' disables autoplay, 'true' enables it for 5000ms intervals

prev-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

next-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

navigation-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

input.desc: Emitted when component's model changes (current panel name); Is also used by v-model

before-transition.desc: Emitted before transitioning to a new panel

newVal.desc: Panel name towards transition is going

oldVal.desc: Panel name from which transition is happening

transition.desc: Emitted after component transitioned to a new panel

newVal.desc: Panel name towards transition has occurred

oldVal.desc: Panel name from which transition has happened

toggleFullscreen.desc: Toggle the view to be fullscreen or not fullscreen

panelName.desc: Panel's name, which may be a String or Number; Number does not refers to panel index, but to its name, which may be an Integer
